participant_abstract.sent: The project group members began to form a cohesive group that approached the new project with professionalism and fellowship.

participant_actions.sent: Florence as Project Manager wrote up the minutes.
As Marketing Sara will research the target market and how to reach them and what they want.
As User Interface design, Steph will look at what users want in a TV remote and what they don't want and what it should look and feel like.
Kate will be advised of the technical aspects.

participant_problems.sent: The onlly issue was finishing early.
The team aspect was semi addressed BEFORE the meeting began-as people arrived in the kitchen.
